channel.title: golang on gobai's blog
channel.description: Recent content in golang on gobai's blog

item.title: 减小go程序编译后的体积
item.description: 编译经典 helloworld 程序 程序代码 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 package main import "fmt" func main() { fmt.Println("Hello World.") } 编译环境 1 2 $ go version go version go1.16.7 linux/amd64 0. 直接编译 1 2 3 $ go build -o helloword main.go $ ls -lh helloword -rwxrwxr-x 1 gobai gobai 1.9M Nov 23 09:34 helloword 1. 除
